name: FederatedIdentity-DevContainer
postCreateCommand: /bin/bash -lc 'command -v forge >/dev/null || (curl -L https://foundry.paradigm.xyz | bash && ~/.foundry/bin/foundryup && sudo install -m 0755 ~/.foundry/bin/forge /usr/local/bin/forge && sudo install -m 0755 ~/.foundry/bin/cast /usr/local/bin/cast); command -v besu >/dev/null  || (command -v install-besu >/dev/null && install-besu 24.5.0 || true); forge --version || true; besu --version || true'
